Text: Thanks for the patches, but what are they for? I used to play this game perfectly on Windows xp but now I have Windows 7 and the game crashes at the start of the first mission. Will these patches fix the problem?

try right clicking on the application and run as administrator.
 the patches are necessary for online play. although they were released before windows 7 came out so there wouldn't be any 7 fix. i play FFOW on 7 and i have to run as admin. 
many people have that problem. XP was always the best for this game.
 try turning of unnecessary services that & always has running for no reason and lighten the CPU load.
Hey man can somone reseed this or can somone say what is the crack for 1.3.0?
Hello anf happy new year, please help me, I have the vitality version but I can not save the game, this patches can solve the problem , and what about the crack I install after or before I patch???

By the way to play online, Download Tunngle and then search for "Frontlines" then press the "fules of war" server then you can join my 24-7 all maps server, it holds up to 64 players with no lag!!

p.s. make sure you select LAN in menu and brows for a server not the internet!!
